headline: They Came To Create A Ruckus
abstract: The eventâ€™s 17th edition was a raucous, invigorating showcase of musicians demanding international attention.
lead_paragraph: A shrinking world, a growing potential audience, an ever-shifting definition of authenticity and the insatiable curiosity of musicians: Globalfest, the annual New York showcase for world music, flaunts all those frictions.
